Package seng202.team3.view

Class GraphViewController

java.lang.Object
seng202.team3.view.GraphViewController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class GraphViewController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Class which used the data provided by the GraphCreator class and creates and populates graphs using the GraphViewWindow.

      public void initYearSelector()
      Constructs the yearSelector comboBox and sets it default value to the first year of the dates.

    • constructYearChoiceBox

      public void constructYearChoiceBox​(javafx.scene.control.ChoiceBox yearSelector, ArrayList<CrimeData> crimeData)
      This method creates the data for the comboBox yearSelector and populates it using the data from the method getYear() in the class GraphCreator.
      Parameters:
      yearSelector - is the comboBox that we populate.
      crimeData - is the ArrayList of crimes we use, to get the dates.

    • graphOverTime

      public void graphOverTime​(ArrayList<CrimeData> crimeData)
      This method uses the data provided by the createGraphOverTime method from the GraphCreator class and creates and populates the lineChart.
      Parameters:
      crimeData - is the ArrayList of crimes used to populate the graph.

    • graphOverTimePerType

      public void graphOverTimePerType​(ArrayList<CrimeData> crimeData, String crimeType)
      This method uses the data provided by the createGraphOverTimePerType method from the GraphCreator class and creates and populates the lineChart.
      Parameters:
      crimeData - is the ArrayList of crimes used to populate the graph.
      crimeType - is the type of the crime we get the data for.
